_id.description: Unique MongoDB identifier for the lesson document.

lessonId.description: Custom numeric identifier for the lesson.

courseId.description: Identifier linking this lesson to its parent course.

description.description: Detailed explanation or summary of what the lesson covers.

assignmentId.description: Optional ID of an assignment linked to this lesson, if applicable.

isActive.description: Indicates whether the lesson is active and visible to students.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the lesson was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the lesson was last updated.

description: Schema definition for the Lessons collection, representing individual lessons belonging to courses.
